name: Multiverse
summary: Dusty multiverse is an official Virtual Burning Man experience and it is an interactive and immersive social platform that thrives on artistic collaboration and participation on a global scale. You can enjoy many unique experiences just like a live Burning man: For examples, performers of all types can broadcast themselves live to a global audience and gift their art in many ways. Participants can also communicate in real time via live voice chat. You appear as a customized 3D avatar and will be able to...
